function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of investment in public health infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease outbreaks and spread","Mitigation":"Increase funding for public health infrastructure and facilities","Technologies":"Healthcare technology for disease surveillance and monitoring","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inequality in access to healthcare services","Impact":"Unequal distribution of health resources and increased susceptibility to disease","Mitigation":"Improve access to healthcare services for marginalized communities","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mobile health clinics","People":"Marginalized communities, low-income individuals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government"},{"Description":"Poor sanitation and waste management","Impact":"Risk of water and food contamination, leading to disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement sanitation systems and waste management practices","Technologies":"Water purification, waste treatment technologies","People":"General public, communities living in unsanitary conditions","Owner":"Local governments, environmental agencies"}]}
